data.title: Chic fragrance
data.content: A chic fragrance for day and night. Unique and sophisticate. I already bought it.

data.title: best experience
data.content: Using jo malone london for Less than a year The fragrances i wear are Light floral This fragrance is perfect for Daytime and evening This fragrance is purchased for Gift for someone

data.title: English Pear Cologne
data.content: This smells so good, I love it! Such a great scent.

data.title: A bit too strong
data.content: It is a very strong perfume. Once I put it on, I could smell it all day. As the day goes on, the smell starts to dissipate a bit. But I personally like more subtle perfumes. It really smells like pear.

data.title: Just Perfection
data.content: When I saw this option I automatically clicked yes. I'm a huge fan of the brand it's fruity and as advertised even on a rough day this makes me feel beautiful and lifts my spirits! I can't wait to use the sample and I've been impressed by all Jo Malone products!!! Absolutely a hit and I can't wait to own more from there. Amazing gifts too (my mentor gave me the most adorable candle!)

data.title: Great
data.content: Yes, I would recommend to a friend

data.title: Great me fragrance
data.content: Smells amazing and has pretty unique scent. I will recommend to my friends and family

data.title: Very long lasting
data.content: Not my taste in scent, but it is definitely well-made as I sprayed it once and it lasted over 24 hours on my clothes. It's a nice scent, just not as youthful as I would prefer for myself.

data.title: Amazing
data.content: I smell the patchouli and powdery note in the opening note. I prefer the dry down of this, as it dries down you start to get a bit more of the rose notes mixed with powder, with a little bit of fruity, tiny hint of Musk. I prefer the dry down of this.
